searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT t.CASE_CODE AS caseCode,t.PROPERTY_ADDR AS propertyAddress,t.WARN_TYPE as warnType,t.WARN_TIME as warnDatetime, t.STATUS as status,t.RELIEVE_TIME as relieveDatetime,t.pkid as PKID FROM (SELECT distinct bw.CASE_CODE ,ttpi.PROPERTY_ADDR ,bw.WARN_TYPE ,bw.WARN_TIME ,bw.STATUS ,bw.RELIEVE_TIME ,c.pkid ,bw.CREATE_TIME ,c.ORG_ID FROM sctrans.T_TO_BIZ_WARN bw LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO AS ttpi ON ttpi.CASE_CODE = bw.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_CASE as c on c.case_code = bw.CASE_CODE LEFT JOIN sctrans.T_TO_WORKFLOW tw on tw.CASE_CODE = bw.CASE_CODE <if test="warnType == 'LOANLOSS' "> LEFT JOIN sctrans.ACT_RU_TASK ART on ART.PROC_INST_ID_ = tw.INST_CODE </if> ) t
where 1=1 <if test="warnType == 'LOANLOSS' "> t.SUSPENSION_STATE_ = '1' <if test="user_LoginName != null"> AND t.ASSIGNEE_ = #userLoginName# </if> </if>
<ifNotNull warnType> and t.WARN_TYPE=#warnType# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull status> and t.STATUS=#status# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull caseCode> and t.CASE_CODE=#caseCode# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull propertyAddr> AND t.PROPERTY_ADDR like '%' + #propertyAddr# + '%' </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull warnTimeStart> AND t.WARN_TIME >= #warnTimeStart# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull warnTimeEnd> AND t.WARN_TIME <= #warnTimeEnd# </ifNotNull> <if test="warnType == 'RepayOverdue' "> <if test="orgFlag == 'false' "> and exists( (SELECT u.USERNAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c inner join sctrans.sys_user u on c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u.id WHERE CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE and u.USERNAME=#userLoginName#) UNION (SELECT u.USERNAME FROM sctrans.T_TG_SERV_ITEM_AND_PROCESSOR p inner join sctrans.sys_user u on p.PROCESSOR_ID = u.id WHERE CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE and u.USERNAME=#userLoginName#) ) </if> <if test="orgFlag == 'true' "> and exists (select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_CASE tc where tc.CASE_CODE = t.CASE_CODE and tc.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#)) </if> </if>
<if test="warnType == 'TransferOverdue' "> <if test="orgFlag == 'false' "> and exists(select 1 from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE t1 left join sctrans.SYS_USER t2 on t1.CREATE_BY=t2.ID where t1.CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE and t2.USERNAME = #userLoginName#) </if> <if test="orgFlag == 'true' "> and exists( select 1 from (select t2.ORG_ID from sctrans.T_TO_ELOAN_CASE t1 left join sctrans.SYS_USER t2 on t1.CREATE_BY=t2.ID where t1.CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE ) t3 where t3.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) ) </if> </if> <if test="warnType == 'LoanerOverdueAccept' "> <if test="orgFlag == 'false' "> and exists(SELECT u.USERNAME FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c inner join sctrans.sys_user u on c.LEADING_PROCESS_ID = u.id WHERE CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE and u.USERNAME=#userLoginName#) </if> <if test="orgFlag == 'true' "> and exists(SELECT 1 FROM sctrans.T_TO_CASE c WHERE CASE_CODE=t.CASE_CODE and c.ORG_ID in (#queryorgs#) ) </if> </if>
